EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/EMA_Data Analytics in Cloud_Q216.Post-event - Registered
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Sorry you missed Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We’re sorry you were unable to attend our webinar Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments. You can, however, watch the replay of the webinar on-demand at your leisure and download the slide deck at the links below:
- Watch the webinar recording <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]> - Download the webinar presentation <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]>
Additional Big Data and analytics resources:
- Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[http://pivotal.io/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - Big & Fast Data: The Democratization of Information <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/white-paper/capgemini-big-fast-data-democratization-of-information]]> - Transforming Business Results with Big Data and Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/transforming-business-results-with-big-data-and-analytics]]> - Operationalizing the Buzz: Big Data Analytics <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/analyst-report/operationalizing-the-buzz]]>
Finally, consider joining us in Las Vegas at SpringOne Platform <[[http://springoneplatform.io]]>, August 1–4. SpringOne Platform brings together the people, process and tools for delivering and operating data-driven software services. There will be in-depth advanced technical topics and accessible introductory content covering data science, machine learning, microservices, agile, continuous delivery, devops, and more. Register today <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>.
If you would like more information or have any questions about Big Data and data science, submit your question and contact information at pivotal.io/contact <[[http://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
